data.title: MRVC invites tender for various works including improvement of stations, FOBs & elevated decks at various stations of Central Railway – Rail Analysis India
data.text:
MRVC invites tender for various works including improvement of stations, FOBs & elevated decks at various stations of Central Railway

Mumbai Railway Vikas Corporation Ltd. (MRVC), under Ministry of Railways (MoR), invites E- bids for Improvement of stations including provision of FOBs, elevated decks, inter-connections between Deck/FOBs, skywalks, relocation of service buildings, stalls, kiosks etc., improving entry/exit, improving circulating areas, provision of green spaces, etc., at various stations of Central Railway through balance 3 (three) lots.

Tender Reference Number: MRVC/W/209

Name of Work: Improvement of stations including provision of FOBs, elevated decks, inter-connections between Deck/FOBs, skywalks, relocation of service buildings, stalls, kiosks etc., improving entry/exit, improving circulating areas, provision of green spaces, etc., at various stations of Central Railway through balance 3 (three) lots.

Document Download / Sale Start Date: 08th June, 2023

Document Download / Sale End Date: 17th July, 2023

Pre Bid Meeting Date: 21st June, 2023

Bid Submission Start Date: 11th July, 2023

Bid Submission End Date: 17th July, 2023

Bid Opening Date: 17th July, 2023

General:

Tenderers may bid on any lot or combination of lots of their choice and are invited to offer discounts in case they are awarded more than one lot. To be eligible for an award of contract for more than one lot, the tenderer is required to meet the sum of the qualification requirement for these lots.

The decision to consider him for award of a particular lot or combination of lots as per his eligibility will be of the employer based on overall financial advantage to the employer (Lowest cost to the employer).

However, Tenderers should mention in the letter of tender (technical part), the order of preference of individual lots, for due consideration by the employer during tender evaluation.

Objective:

The objective of the proposal is to provide a improvement with holistic planning, which allows substantial increase of station’s quality of service, in terms of comfort, facilities and pedestrian fluidity including following:

Fast and efficient passenger flow: To deal with the level of traffic, existing difficulties in managing passengers’ movement and dispersal.

Safety and Security: To mend the decrepit structures and provide fire safety, in the station area.

Maximum Passenger Convenience: To make stations equipped in terms of services, commercial facilities, amenities and waiting premises.

Flexible Interiors: To take care of the fast construction, it is important to adapt the flexible/ modular interiors, so that in a short span of time, facilities can be provided.

It is planned to upgrade work consisting of provision of FOBs, elevated decks, inter connection between deck/FOBs, skywalk, relocation of service buildings, stalls, kiosks etc., improving entry/exit, improving circulating area, provision of green space, etc. at various stations of Central & Western Railways.

General:

Mumbai Railway Vikas Corporation has given consultancy contracts to M/s Intercontinental Consultants and Technocrats Pvt. Ltd. and Gian P. Mathur & Associates Pvt. Ltd. for detailed planning for improvement of Identified Suburban Railway Stations of Central and Western Railway in Mumbai. Based on the study of said consultant 13 stations have been identified for inclusion in station improvement work along with following facilities:

Provision of new Deck, FOBs, Link ways, skywalks.

Inter connections between FOBs through Deck.

Provision of platforms, extension/Rebuilding of platforms

Provision of escalators and elevators.

Development of circulating areas, green patches.

Enabling works such as relocation of structures, utilities shifting.

The work is being funded by Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) and considering the importance and priority of the work, successful tenderers will have to undertake the works at various stations simultaneously deploying adequate resources and ensure completion within prescribed time.

The works are difficult in nature considering working at busy suburban stations involves night blocks/ night working and involves working across the track/in between the track/close to track necessitating highest safety standards at work site.

Many of the activities across tracks shall have to be done in traffic and Power blocks which are generally available during night hours. The available traffic and power blocks are limited to one to one & half hours only. All the activities above running tracks and in vicinity of track i.e., within 3.50m from the centre of tracks shall be done in these limited traffic blocks.

Further, there are a number of cables laid underground in work areas related to signalling, Power Supply, Telecom etc., entire excavation in the yards for foundation shall be done manually to avoid damages to underground utilities such as cables, water supply pipes, sewage lines etc.

No work within 2.50m from OHE wires shall be taken up without power shut down on OHE and earthing of OHE and shall be taken up only in presence of authorised competent staff of the Electrical department of MRVC/Railway.

The design and drawings of the work are developed/being developed by the consultant and approved drawings will be made available to the successful tenderer for undertaking the works on award of Tender. The drawings enclosed along with Tender are tentative.

The materials, designs, standard, considered in the work are of better quality in comparison to the existing interventions, with emphasis on durability and aesthetics. Interested tenderers shall go through the tender schedule, and technical specifications from the tender document for better understanding and appreciation of the scope of work involved in the Tender.

Scope of Work:

LOT wise site-specific scope:

Ghatkopar:

2 FOBs (South end and North end).

1 Deck on the west side.

1 linkway.

One Booking office, Railway Ofiics and public toilet block.

Escalators & Elevators.

Parking area on the East side.

Modification of Entry/Exit of station.

Dismantling of Existing Structures infringing proposed work.

Dismantling of existing FOBs.

Boundary wall, if required.

Restoration of COP, Flooring of Platform dismantled, if any for construction of Deck.

Available horticulture and green patches with Station beautification related work.

Dismantling/modifications of structures, if any, for construction of Deck, high walk, Boundary wall etc.

Shifting of underground utilities encountered, if any.

Any other miscellaneous works required to complete work.

Bhandup:

2 FOBs. (Middle and South end)

1 Deck on the west side interconnecting 4 FOBs.

Elevated booking office and ATM on east side deck.

One public toilet and RPF room on the east side.

One public toilet and one staff toilet on the west side.

Escalators & Elevators.

Parking area on the West side.

Parking area on the East side.

Paved and covered plaza on entrances.

Dismantling of Existing Structures infringing proposed work.

Dismantling of existing FOB.

Boundary wall, if required.

Restoration of COP, Flooring of Platform dismantled, if any for construction of Deck.

Available horticulture and green patches with Station beautification related work.

Dismantling/modifications of structures, if any, for construction of Deck, Boundary wall etc.

Shifting of underground utilities encountered, if any.

Any other miscellaneous works required to complete works.

LOT-II:

Mulund:

1 Deck on the west side.

3 FOBs (South end, Middle and North end).

17 nos. of Staircase at Various locations of Proposed Deck & FOBs, Building.

Escalators & Elevators.

SSE office building, Healthcare unit & G+2 building for Station Manager, Telecom office, RPF, GRPF, SSE Signal offices on the west side.

1 nos. of elevated booking office at East side.

Vehicle parking on the West side of PF No.1.

One public toilet.

Paved and covered plaza on entrance.

Dismantling of Existing Structures infringing proposed work.

Dismantling of existing FOBs.

Boundary wall, if required.

Restoration of COP, Flooring of Platform dismantled, if any for construction of Deck.

Available horticulture and green patches with Station beautification related work.

Dismantling/modifications of structures, if any, for construction of Deck, Boundary wall etc.

Shifting of underground utilities encountered, if any.

Any other miscellaneous works required to complete works.

Dombivli:

2 FOBs. (South end and North end)

1 Deck on the west side connecting 5 FOBs.

One public toilet and TC office on PF 03/04.

One CBS cum PRS booking office.

Station master office and RPF offices.

Escalators & Elevators.

Parking area on the West side.

Dismantling of Existing Structures infringing proposed work.

Dismantling of existing FOB, if required.

Boundary wall, if required.

Restoration of COP, Flooring of Platform dismantled, if any for construction of Deck.

Available horticulture and green patches with Station beautification related work.

Dismantling/modifications of structures, if any, for construction of Deck, Boundary wall etc.

Shifting of underground utilities encountered, if any.

Any other miscellaneous works required to complete works.

LOT-III:

GTBN:

Deck connecting east & west entrances on south end (Crossing 2 tracks and platform no. 01/02).

Deck from ROB to entry on Proposed Platform.

Proposed home platform on the west side.

Extension of existing island platform towards Vashi end.

Escalators & Elevators.

IOW office, staff room, exchange room and accounts store on east side under south deck.

Elevated Booking office, CBS office, CNC office, announcer’s room, server room, etc., on the south deck.

Toilet block on north end of Proposed Home platform.

Two-wheeler parking at the east side on the north end.

Modification of Entry/Exit of station.

Dismantling of Existing Structures infringing proposed work

Dismantling of existing North FOB.

Boundary wall, if required.

Restoration of COP, Flooring of Platform dismantled, if any for construction of Deck.

Available horticulture and green patches with Station beautification related work.

Dismantling/modifications of structures, if any, for construction of Deck, high walk, Boundary wall etc.

Shifting of underground utilities encountered, if any.

Any other miscellaneous works required to complete work.

Chembur:

Proposed home platform on the east side.

1 FOB (middle).

S&T & relay room at north end.

GRP office & TC room on island platform

Toilet block on south end of proposed home platform.

Paved and covered plaza on east entrance.

Escalators.

Dismantling of Existing Structures infringing proposed work.

Dismantling of existing middle FOB.

Boundary wall, if required.

Restoration of COP, Flooring of Platform dismantled, if any for construction of Deck.

Available horticulture and green patches with Station beautification related work.

Dismantling/modifications of structures, if any, for construction of Deck, Boundary wall etc.

Shifting of underground utilities encountered, if any.

Any other miscellaneous works required to complete works.

Govandi:

Deck on east side entrance (Connecting North & Middle FOBs Crossing 1 track &Platform 01/02)

Escalators & Elevators.

Booking and reservation office, CBS office, announcer’s room, server room & TC office on east entrance deck.

Medical room on the east side under deck.

Paved entrance plaza on east side.

Dismantling of Existing Structures infringing proposed work.

Dismantling of existing FOB, if required.

Boundary wall, if required.

Restoration of COP, Flooring of Platform dismantled, if any for construction of Deck.

Available horticulture and green patches with Station beautification related work.

Dismantling/modifications of structures, if any, for construction of Deck, high walk, Boundary wall etc.

Shifting of underground utilities encountered, if any.

Any other miscellaneous works required to complete work.

Mankhurd:

1 Deck. (On the west side)

2 FOBs (North and South).

Booking office, SM office, TC office & Police Chowki at West side of PF no.1.

Booking office near South – East end of South FOB.

Toilet block at South End of PF no. 2.

Escalators & Elevators.

Widening of Platform no. 1 & 2. And Extension of PF no. 3.

Entrance Paved and Covered Plaza with 2-Wheeler, 4-Wheeler parking.

2-Wheeler Parking South – West of Station.

Modification of Entry/Exit of station.

Dismantling of Existing Structures infringing proposed work.

Dismantling of existing FOB, if required.

Boundary wall, if required.

Restoration of COP, Flooring of Platform dismantled, if any for construction of Deck.

Available horticulture and green patches with Station beautification related work.

Dismantling/modifications of structures, if any, for construction of Deck, high walk, Boundary wall etc.

Shifting of underground utilities encountered, if any.

Any other miscellaneous works required to complete work.

The draft Terms of Reference (Draft ToR) is available at MRVC website www.mrvc.indianrailways.gov.in

Source: MRVC- Tender | Image Credit (representational): MRVC
